title: Phantasy Star II Improvement
author: FlamePurge
fileName: Phantasy Star II (USA, Europe) (Rev A) - Improvement
description: Bug fix and enhancement mod geared toward rebalancing the underutilized characters and implementing gameplay quality upgrades.
v4.5 - Includes EvilJagaGenius’ camera movement tweak. Now the camera follows the player as it moves, rather than when they approach the screen’s edge.
Included are equipment, tech, and tech acquisition lists. These are not required to play PSII Improvement.
